scripts.push:button: cd vvc-button && vvc widget push -g && vvc widget activate -g && cd ..
scripts.push:halo: cd vvc-halo && vvc widget push -g && vvc widget activate -g && cd ..
scripts.push:popup: cd vvc-popup && vvc widget push -g && vvc widget activate -g && cd ..
scripts.push:sidetab: cd vvc-sidetab && vvc widget push -g && vvc widget activate -g && cd ..
scripts._push:all: npm run push:button && npm run push:halo && npm run push:popup && npm run push:sidetab
